media:group.media:description:
ORIGINALLY PRESENTED AS PART OF SIGGRAPH 2022 

BUILDING THE METAVERSE: AN EXPERT DISCUSSION
Are we still in the early adopter stage of the metaverse? What have recent events taught us about where this tech is going?

SIGGRAPH 2022 presents a discussion with Cathy Hackl (Futures Intelligence Group) and Dan Burgar (Frontier Collection) in which weâ€™ll cover all things metaverse and its looming presence in computer graphics and interactive techniques. Watch now for a moderated panel to expand your view of the metaverse and its potential.

Check out our SIGGRAPH Now playlist for more computer graphics insights: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUPhVMQuDB_ZeOSy0uhlmVgcETB_Prf1I
